Race.SpecificTitle: City Marshal -- City Court, City of Oakdale
Road Dist. No. 1 -- 10.35 Mills - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Road District No. 1 Proposition
(Tax Continuation)

Summary:  10 years, 10.35 mills property tax continuation for constructing, operating and maintaining Parish roads and bridges within Road District No. 1.
Race.FullText: Shall Road District No. 1 of the Parish of Allen, State of Louisiana (the "District"), continue to levy a ten and thirty-five hundredths (10.35) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation within the District (an estimated $103,086 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2012 and ending with the year 2021, for the purpose of constructing, operating and maintaining Parish roads and bridges within the District, said millage to represent a one and nineteen hundredths mills (1.19) increase over the 9.16 mills tax authorized to be levied through the year 2011 pursuant to an election held on April 7, 2001?

Race.SpecificTitle: Road Dist. No. 2 Prop. #1 -- 11.04 Mills - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Road District No. 2 Propositions
Proposition No. 1 
(Tax Continuation)

Summary:  10 years, 11.04 mills property tax continuation for constructing, improving and maintaining Parish roads within Road District No. 2.
Race.FullText: Shall Road District No. 2 of the Parish of Allen, State of Louisiana (the "District"), continue to levy an eleven and four hundredths (11.04) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation within the District (an estimated $259,360 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year  2012 and ending with the year 2021, for the purpose of constructing, improving and maintaining Parish roads within the District, said millage to represent a seventy-eight hundredths of a mill (.78) increase over the 10.26 mills tax authorized to be levied through the year 2011 pursuant to an election held on April 7, 2001?

Race.SpecificTitle: Road Dist. No. 2 Prop. #2 -- 5.52 Mills - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Road District No. 2 Propositions
Proposition No. 2
(Tax Continuation)

Summary: 10 years, 5.52 mills property tax continuation for constructing, operating and maintaining Parish bridges within Road District No. 2.
Race.FullText: Shall Road District No. 2 of the Parish of Allen, State of Louisiana (the "District"), continue to levy a five and fifty-two hundredths (5.52) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation within the District (an estimated $129,680 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2012 and ending with the year 2021, for the purpose of constructing, operating and maintaining Parish bridges within the District, said millage to represent a thirty-nine hundredths of a mill (.39) increase over the 5.13 mills tax authorized to be levied through the year 2011 pursuant to an election held on April 7, 2001?

Race.SpecificTitle: Road Dist. No. 3 -- 9.63 Mills - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Road District No. 3 Proposition
(Tax Continuation)

Summary:  10 years, 9.63 mills property tax continuation for constructing, operating and maintaining Parish roads and bridges within Road District No. 3.
Race.FullText: Shall Road District No. 3 of the Parish of Allen, State of Louisiana (the "District"), continue to levy a nine and sixty-three hundredths (9.63) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation within the District (an estimated $100,755 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2012 and ending with the year 2021, for the purpose of constructing, operating and maintaining Parish roads and bridges within the District, said millage to represent a sixty-eight hundredths of a mill (.68) increase over the 8.95 mills tax authorized to be levied through the year 2011 pursuant to an election held on April 7, 2001?
